name: Flaring Cannon Equip, Baur Vairina
effect: XoverDress - One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit (You may place it by stacking it on all of the specified units instead of normal calling it to (RC))[ACT](RC):If this unit is in the XoverDress state, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the XoverDress state attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC). Then, if your opponent has one or less rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of that battle, this unit gets drive -1, and this unit performs drive checks.
flavor: In order to protect the bright future among the many brilliant possibilities......

name: Meteor Flare Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), until end of turn, all of your opponent's rear-guards lose all of their [CONT] abilities, and cannot gain them. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater and they have no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: If you're winning in numbers, then all that's left is to widen the gap.

name: Stealth Beast, Silent Crow
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard in the same column as this unit is retired by your card's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: A spy that blends in and dances within the darkness takes flight one step ahead.

name: Heat Haze Acrobat, Miroslava
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your soul, put it into your hand if you chose a card with the same card name as your vanguard, and call it to (RC) if you did not. If you put a card into your hand, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Now, appearing next is......!

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2]. If all of the cards [Soul-Charge] have different grades, you may draw a card.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 4 cards with different grades], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1. ([Power] at that time becomes 1, and can increase or decrease afterwards)
flavor: There is no shame in defeat. It is only logical as I am your opponent.

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Rockargour
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your soul has four or more cards with different grades, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Never let your guard down or leave an opening.

name: Blitz CEO, Welstra
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it. (Activate its Operate ability)[AUTO](VC):When you operate a Product, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: An endless untrodden field. What I seek can be found there.

name: Blitz Secretary, Perfe
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 2 or greater set order from drop on the bottom of the deck], and draw a card.
flavor: She is the only one that can handle the reckless schedule changes from the CEO.

name: Blitz Engineer, Hoflio
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you did not operate a Product this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it. (Activate its Operate ability)[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you operate a Product this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: 100% customer satisfaction starts with a detailed after-service.

name: Unrivaled Heavenly Blade, Descorda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have six or more grade 3 or greater units, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit's attack will hit regardless of [Power] if the sum of the grades of your opponent's guardians is not 3 or greater.
flavor: Those without a solid resolve are no match for me.

name: Youthberk "RevolForm: Tempest"
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top two cards of your deck, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with the same grade as any of the revealed cards, and put it on the bottom of their deck. Put all of the revealed cards into your hand.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, choose a card with the [RevolDress] ability from your soul, and ride it as [Rest].
flavor: The overflowing rain of sorrow... The emerald tempest shall blow it all away.

name: Knight of Rendering Flash, Cairbre
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less unit card, and put it into your hand if it is not. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: This flash of light shall become the first strike to shatter the skies.

name: Benevolent Maiden, Araserith
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], discard the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from your drop, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less card, and put it into your hand if it has the same card name as your vanguard.
flavor: The color of the blooming future... I can't wait to see it!

name: Resonance Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your units boosted a total of three or more times this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, and your units boosted a total of five or more times this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
flavor: Resonating roars shall create a new tune.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Alpin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for every two of your grade 2 or greater units. If this unit gets [Power] +10000 or more by this effect, at the end of that battle, [COST][bind this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: A long rest after a day of hard work.

name: Break Equip Dragon, Urbargo
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Imminent threats can become the turning point to reverse situations.

name: Assault Bullet of Dust Storm, Oswald
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater and they have no rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, [Stand] it, and increase or decrease its [Critical] and drive to 1 until end of turn.
flavor: Allow me to show you the hunts of the dust storm.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Samahdi
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your (VC) has two or more Arms, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[ACT](RC):If your (VC) has an Arms, [COST][retire this unit], choose an Arms card from your hand or drop, and arm it to one of your vanguards. If you armed a card, you cannot arm your vanguard until end of turn.
flavor: As long as there's a will, the blade shall not break.

name: Lilac Lasher
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each card in your soul.
flavor: Wielders of special abilities will attract each other and continue to heighten their powers.

name: Power Gem Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your soul.
flavor: Achieve victory by any means... To them, it's instinct.

name: Falcate Performer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, choose up to one card from your drop, and if your soul does not have a card with the same grade as that card, put it into your soul.
flavor: A fun night with the crescent moon. Is there anyone feeling left out?

name: Gravidia Allanhil
effect: [CONT](GC):If your order zone has a Meteorite, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), reveal the top card of your deck, put it into your order zone if it is a Meteorite card, and put it on the bottom of your deck if it is not.
flavor: The stars shall rain down simply for realizing their ideals...

name: Blitz Mechanic, Iskra
effect: [ACT](RC):If you did not operate a Product this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & [Rest] this unit], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it. (Activate its Operate ability)
flavor: This new weapon we made with Ms. Aurora is quite nice~!

name: Blitz Mechanic, Schtart
effect: [ACT](RC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a "Heavy Strike Cannon Fortress, Freischutz" from order zone into drop & retire this unit], choose up to one "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum" from your hand, and put it into your order zone.
flavor: OK! Tuning is perfect! Now, get out there and do your best!

name: Heavenly Wings of Purity, Honnettaria
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, and you have five or more units, draw a card.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have six or more units, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: Oh knights, to the front! Now is the time to display our pride!

name: Wayward Therapy Angel
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden, and cannot be normal called to (RC) from hand.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to a back row (RC).
flavor: Skill is a given. Though finding the motivation can be difficult.

name: Witch of Accumulation, Sequana
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Youthberk" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000.[AUTO](RC):When your unit is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and increase or decrease its drive to 1 until end of turn.
flavor: Power and will overlap. In such a way that it shall not waver.

name: Tear Knight, Aricks
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if it is the second battle of this turn, and you have a [Stand] vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Following the second strike, is a fierce third strike.

name: Festoso Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), it gets "Boost" until end of turn, and discard the rest.
flavor: Cheerful sounds with the brilliant parade. Almost like the lands told in fairytales.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Seroll
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck or hand, if you have a vanguard with "Sylvan Horned Beast" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Magnolia" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name, your persona ride also increases the [Power] of your back row units.
flavor: Now is the moment for what blooms beyond yearning.

name: Strike Cannon of Dust Storm, Andrea
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Make sure that preparations are properly done. Aim for the big one. Focus on that single point.

name: Pierce Equip Dragon, Valsable
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less ＜Prayer Dragon＞ from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Bind these weapons with prayers.

name: Lavamane Wyvern
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your rear-guards with originalDress, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Guided by spirits, the scorching heat burns the earth.

name: Sorrow Severing Twin Blades
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 2]!Choose one of your rear-guards with originalDress, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: A new hope is born, and the blades ensure that the light does not fade away.

name: Attract Inverse
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul, if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a grade 2 or less card from your soul, and call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.
flavor: Isn't this a little more comfortable?

name: Reaper in the Shadows, Zeilmort
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.
flavor: Death awaits all. It is a noble ritual that cleanses the soul.

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Rystal Galer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][put a card from hand into your soul], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: I can see through your plans.

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Matelvaara
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop, and put it into your soul. Then, if your soul has four or more cards with different grades, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The swirling miasma is condensed and made into a demonic stone that shines in rainbow colors.

name: Gravidia Almanon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a Meteorite card from your drop, put it into your hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: So our ideals cannot be understood by lesser beings...

name: Blitz Accounting Department Head, Sordio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you operate "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum", if you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The consequences of the CEO's recklessness usually fall upon the accounting department.

name: Overwatching Monster, Proteed
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is retired during your opponent's turn, [COST][bind this unit], and put that retired card into your hand.
flavor: The peaceful night shall be protected, together with the resonating sounds of the earth.

name: Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum
effect: [CONT]:You cannot play this card.Operate - [AUTO]Order Zone:When this card is operated, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn. [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return a rear-guard to your hand], and call this card as a [Power] 23000/[Critical] 1 normal unit to an open (RC). If you called a card, put that unit into the order zone at the end of turn.
flavor: A perfect air fortress that has all of Cray within its shooting range.

name: Graceful Heavenly Flash, Hermona
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):When your vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], move this unit to (GC), and it gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Blessings to the brave warriors.

name: Spinning Knight, Gwendolen
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked, if you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: This is it. Time to reap your life.

name: Divine Sister, Languedechat
effect: [CONT](RC):If your soul has a grade 3 or greater card, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: It feels a little prickly, right? That's the weight of your sins♪

name: Divine Sister, Palmier
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor: I've got the flow started! Now let's teach them a lesson!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Tigralta
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your other unit in the same column as this unit attacks, that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I'll stay on the lookout. Now go.

name: Archaeology Scholar, Ante Ealter
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your other units in the same column as this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Buried in the ground is the past that is yet to be seen... That is the meaning of romance......

name: Rousing Breath Dragon
effect: [CONT]Back Row Center (RC):During the fifth battle of this turn or more, the cost of all the original [AUTO] abilities of your vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].
flavor: Controlling the series of waves and executing justice.

name: Sympathize dB
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, call it to (RC), or discard it. If you called a card, until end of turn, that called unit cannot attack, and gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Play the tune of your thoughts, because hearts yearn to resound with each other.

name: Blaze Hook Monk, Nissha
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a rear-guard with two or more originalDress, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: See your noble prayers through until the end.

name: Roaring Cannon Dragon, Salvorex
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if your opponent's front row has a rear-guard, this unit cannot attack vanguards.
flavor: Obliterate everything by means of overwhelming firepower.

name: Gallant Flare Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1]." until end of turn.
flavor: Everchanging flames shall dye the battlefield red.

name: Blaze Maiden, Sienna
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a rear-guard with two or more originalDress, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Cumulated prayers shall become definitive power.

name: Beautiful Bullet of Dust Storm, Jodi
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or less normal unit other than a sentinel from your drop, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
flavor: You're in the way! I can't aim properly!

name: Crushing Equip Dragon, Khatyaguard
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, if your soul has no cards, [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: A heavy strike that will shake the soul.

name: Dual Electrose Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Cries of triumph run through the earth like lightning.

name: Dragritter, Midhat
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your unit [Stand] by your card's ability, [COST][retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: Let's add to that valiant figure!

name: Sky-severing Demonic Blade, Alter-slaughter
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 6 grade 0 cards], [Soul-Charge 6], choose six of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I've been waiting all this time, for the moment when I can use all my strength.

name: Steady Spiky
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 0 card from hand into your soul], choose a grade 1 card from your soul, and put it into your hand.
flavor: It'll change, into the form that I wish it to.

name: Hypno Grasper
effect: [CONT]Back Row (RC):During your turn, if your soul has six or more cards, this unit gets "Boost", and if your soul has twelve or more cards, it gets [Power] +10000. (If your soul has five or less cards after boosting, the unit can still continue to boost)
flavor: You'll be the only one dirtying their hands. Now, go.

name: Inhale Pit
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 1 or greater card], choose two grade 0 cards from your drop, and put them into your soul.
flavor: I'll end it within me.

name: Steam Fighter, Ziusdra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Gears approaching from outside your consciousness... There's no easy way to avoid them.

name: Steam Shooter, Puanam
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: I'll hit it with delayed shots!

name: Depletion Sabbia
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & retire this unit], choose ten cards from your soul, and return all other cards from your soul to your deck and shuffle it.
flavor: Shape up. I'll help.

name: Magnereversal Breaker
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name![Soul-Charge 3]. Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):If your soul has ten or more cards, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: The old order shall crumble here, and new rules shall be built.

name: Erosion Demon Monster, Nautigalbus
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if your order zone has two or more cards, you may draw a card. If you drew a card, choose a card from your hand, and put it into your soul.
flavor: Those arms can split the earth, and swallow civilizations.

name: Blitz Top Sales, Anrig
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Welstra" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], search your deck or drop for up to one "Heavy Strike Cannon Fortress, Freischutz" or "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum", reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
flavor: It is our duty to answer the needs of our customers.

name: Blitz Technology Researcher, Uber
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it. (Activate its Operate ability)[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, [COST][put a Product from order zone into drop], search your deck or hand for up to one grade 2 Product card, put it into your order zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put a card from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: Passion filled with madness shall give birth to revolutionary new technology.

name: Blitz Security, Wachten
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a Product in your order zone, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: None shall trespass as I am here.

name: Blitz Programmer, Strazer
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, search your deck or hand for up to one grade 1 Product card, put it into your order zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put a card from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: The cannon strike program had a lot of redundancy, so I rewrote it.

name: Blitz Mechanic, Warton
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: From dog houses to space elevators; we at Blitz Industrial Corporation build them all.

name: Heavy Strike Cannon Fortress, Freischutz
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone.) Operate - [AUTO]Order Zone:When this card is operated, choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Order Zone:When your grade 3 or greater vanguard is placed by riding from a grade 3, [COST][put this card into your drop], search your deck or hand for up to one "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum", put it into your order zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put a card from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: Known for its overwhelming firepower, the impregnable cannon strike fortress.

name: Incandescent Flame Cannon, Abhasal
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your order zone.) Operate - [AUTO]Order Zone:When this card is operated, choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The state-of-the-art fixed artillery with unparalleled accuracy.

name: Silent Sorrow Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your other rear-guard was retired by your card's ability this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Converting overflowing life into physical strength.

name: Forestall Arrow Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard is being attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle for every two units on your (VC) and (RC).
flavor: It is my duty to spin the threads of a noble future.

name: Knight of Demolition, Maredu
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and put it on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: Hit!!

name: Knight of Piercing Sky, Sconfiza
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have three or more grade 3 or greater units, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and put it on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: No matter the reason, you shall not pass here.

name: Knight of Shredding, Theutathes
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with [Critical] 2 or greater attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000.
flavor: So you're planning the ambush here? Allow me to join you.

name: Knight of Enmity, Aine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) by any card's ability, if your hand has three or less cards, draw a card.
flavor: What is left is the will to counterattack.

name: Knight of Gale, Cyneblugar
effect: [CONT]RC:During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The perfect opponent! I'll respond with all of my wind!

name: Knight of Heavenly Echoes, Sonithea
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, if that battle's drive checks did not reveal a grade 3, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
flavor: There's no way that I'd fail at such a crucial moment!

name: Agogik Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, all of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit get "Boost".
flavor: Perfectly coordinated marching brings cheers.

name: Knight of Fidelity, Alphonzo
effect: AUTO:When this unit is put on (GC), if your back row has two or more grade 1 or less rear-guards, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Allow me to show you, my unwithering love.

name: Ferocious Hunter
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Taking prey with enjoyment. That is our unchanging rule.

name: Float Assault
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits, if you have a [Stand] vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: This is his field. Nobody can escape from him.

name: Noblesse Flit
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: It's beautiful, right? When I control the light.

name: Billow Assault
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When the attack this unit boosted hits, if you have a [Stand] vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: The waves are fierce; aiming for further heights.

name: Trigeminal Assault
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: We can't afford to stop here, right?

name: Consort Strike Brave Shooter
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):When your rear-guard attacks, if it is the first battle of this turn, that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The first strike to start the battle, let's give it our best shot!

name: Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva
effect: [ACT](VC):[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose up to one "Trickstar" and up to one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit from your drop, and call them to (RC).[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards in the XoverDress state, and [Stand] it.

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2]. If all of the cards [Soul-Charge] have different grades, you may draw a card.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 4 cards with different grades], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1.

name: Flaring Cannon Equip, Baur Vairina
effect: XoverDress - One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit[ACT](RC):If this unit is in the XoverDress state, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the XoverDress state attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC). Then, if your opponent has one or less rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of that battle, this unit gets drive-1, and this unit performs drive checks.

name: Meteor Flare Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), until end of turn, all of your opponent's rear-guards lose all of their [CONT] abilities, and cannot gain them. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater and they have no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Stealth Beast, Silent Crow
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard in the same column as this unit is retired by your card's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Heat Haze Acrobat, Miroslava
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your soul, put it into your hand if you chose a card with the same card name as your vanguard, and call it to (RC) if you did not. If you put a card into your hand, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Drajeweled
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Soul-Charge 2]. If all of the cards [Soul-Charge] have different grades, you may draw a card.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 4 cards with different grades], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, until end of turn, increase or decrease its [Power] to 1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1.

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Rockargour
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your soul has four or more cards with different grades, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Blitz CEO, Welstra
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it.[AUTO](VC):When you operate a Product, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Blitz Secretary, Perfe
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 2 or greater set order from drop on the bottom of the deck], and draw a card.

name: Blitz Engineer, Hoflio
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you did not operate a Product this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you operate a Product this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Unrivaled Heavenly Blade, Descorda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have six or more grade 3 or greater units, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit's attack will hit regardless of [Power] if the sum of the grades of your opponent's guardians is not 3 or greater.

name: Youthberk "RevolForm: Tempest"
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top two cards of your deck, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with the same grade as any of the revealed cards, and put it on the bottom of their deck. Put all of the revealed cards into your hand.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, choose a card with the [RevolDress] ability from your soul, and ride it as [Rest].

name: Knight of Rendering Flash, Cairbre
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less unit card, and put it into your hand if it is not. Shuffle your deck.

name: Benevolent Maiden, Araserith
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], discard the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from your drop, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less card, and put it into your hand if it has the same card name as your vanguard.

name: Resonance Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your units boosted a total of three or more times this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, and your units boosted a total of five or more times this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Alpin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for every two of your grade 2 or greater units. If this unit gets [Power] +10000 or more by this effect, at the end of that battle, [COST][bind this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].

name: Break Equip Dragon, Urbargo
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Assault Bullet of Dust Storm, Oswald
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater and they have no rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, [Stand] it, and increase or decrease its [Critical] and drive to 1 until end of turn.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Samahdi
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your (VC) has two or more Arms, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[ACT](RC):If your (VC) has an Arms, [COST][retire this unit], choose an Arms card from your hand or drop, and arm it to one of your vanguards. If you armed a card, you cannot arm your vanguard until end of turn.

name: Strike Cannon of Dust Storm, Andrea
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Pierce Equip Dragon, Valsable
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less ＜Prayer Dragon＞ from your drop, and call it to (RC).

name: Lavamane Wyvern
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your rear-guards with originalDress, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Sorrow Severing Twin Blades
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 2]!Choose one of your rear-guards with originalDress, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Lilac Lasher
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each card in your soul.

name: Power Gem Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your soul.

name: Falcate Performer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, choose up to one card from your drop, and if your soul does not have a card with the same grade as that card, put it into your soul.

name: Attract Inverse
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul, if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a grade 2 or less card from your soul, and call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.

name: Reaper in the Shadows, Zeilmort
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.

name: Demonic Jewel Dragon, Rystal Galer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you [Soul-Blast 4] or more cards at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][put a card from hand into your soul], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Matelvaara
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop, and put it into your soul. Then, if your soul has four or more cards with different grades, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Gravidia Allanhil
effect: [CONT](GC):If your order zone has a Meteorite, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), reveal the top card of your deck, put it into your order zone if it is a Meteorite card, and put it on the bottom of your deck if it is not.

name: Blitz Mechanic, Iskra
effect: [AUTO](RC):If you did not operate a Product this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & [Rest] this unit], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it.

name: Blitz Mechanic, Schtart
effect: [ACT](RC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a "Heavy Strike Cannon Fortress, Freischutz" from order zone into drop & retire this unit], choose up to one "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum" from your hand, and put it into your order zone.

name: Gravidia Almanon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a Meteorite card from your drop, put it into your hand, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Blitz Accounting Department Head, Sordio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you operate "Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum", if you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Overwatching Monster, Proteed
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is retired during your opponent's turn, [COST][bind this unit], and put that retired card into your hand.

name: Mobile Fortress of Obliteration, Freischutz Maximum
effect: [CONT]:You cannot play this card.Operate - [AUTO]Order Zone:When this card is operated, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn. [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & return a rear-guard to your hand], and call this card as a [Power] 23000/[Critical] 1 normal unit to an open (RC). If you called a card, put that unit into the order zone at the end of turn.

name: Heavenly Wings of Purity, Honnettaria
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, and you have five or more units, draw a card.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have six or more units, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Wayward Therapy Angel
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden, and cannot be normal called to (RC) from hand.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to a back row (RC).

name: Witch of Accumulation, Sequana
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Youthberk" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000.[AUTO](RC):When your unit is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and increase or decrease its drive to 1 until end of turn.

name: Graceful Heavenly Flash, Hermona
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):When your vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], move this unit to (GC), and it gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Spinning Knight, Gwendolen
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked, if you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.

name: Divine Sister, Languedechat
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater card in your soul, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.

name: Divine Sister, Palmier
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Tear Knight, Aricks
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if it is the second battle of this turn, and you have a [Stand] vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Festoso Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), it gets "Boost" until end of turn, and discard the rest.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Seroll
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck or hand, if you have a vanguard with "Sylvan Horned Beast" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Magnolia" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name, your persona ride also increases the [Power] of your back row units.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Tigralta
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your other unit in the same column as this unit attacks, that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Archaeology Scholar, Ante Ealter
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your other units in the same column as this unit, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Rousing Breath Dragon
effect: [CONT]Back Row Center (RC):During the fifth battle of this turn or more, the cost of all the original [AUTO] abilities of your vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1].

name: Sympathize dB
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, call it to (RC), or discard it. If you called a card, until end of turn, that called unit cannot attack, and gets [Power] +10000.

name: Blaze Maiden, Parama
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Rino! Even if it's tough, it's no reason to cry and whine!

name: Diabolos Girls, Natalia
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: We'll make the play, we're gonna score! Our dynamic will take back more~!

name: Cardinal Draco, Enpyro
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Twisting causality. That you may not do as you please.

name: Bard of Heavenly Song, Alpacc
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: In tough times, the heroic timbre supports the heart.

name: Frenzied Heiress
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Insanity can sometimes be a weapon.

name: Burning Flail Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted,[COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Just being crushed is not going to be the end of this.

name: Stem Deviate Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted,[COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Piercing through time, the bullet to confirm destruction is fired.

name: Patrol Robo, Dekarcop
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted,[COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Please leave this place to me!!

name: Blade Feather Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted,[COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: These wings are not just for flying.

name: Aspiring Maiden, Alana
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted,[COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Here! One more crown as a present♪

name: Flare Veil Dragon
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: The crimson wings burn off all kinds of malice.

name: Rouse Wildmaster, Riley
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Don't touch! Okay? Or you'd be eaten.

name: Ameliorate Connector
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Replacement completed. Conductivity greatly increased.

name: Protection Magic, Prorobi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Serene Maiden, Lena
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Terrifying Wicked Dragon King, Vamfrieze
